error.signature: Error: Reference to undeclared output value or output not found in module
error.regex: (Reference to undeclared output|output .+ not found|module .+ has no output named|Reference to undefined output)

verdict.summary: Configuration references an output that does not exist in the module or root configuration.

dead_ends.action: Access module internals directly instead of using outputs
dead_ends.why_fails: Terraform modules are encapsulated; you cannot reference internal resources without explicit outputs

dead_ends.action: Use terraform console to force-read the value
dead_ends.why_fails: terraform console has the same access restrictions as plan/apply; undefined outputs remain undefined

workarounds.action: Add the missing output block to the module
workarounds.how: Add output "name" { value = resource.type.name.attribute } to the module's outputs.tf

workarounds.action: Check for typos in the output name reference
workarounds.how: Compare module.NAME.OUTPUT_NAME with the actual output names defined in the module source

leads_to.condition: Missing output leads to invalid reference chains in dependent resources

preceded_by.condition: Module version update removed or renamed an output

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Unsupported attribute is about accessing a non-existent field on a resource; output reference error is about a missing output from a module
